AboutMe.experience: I am a full-time Software Engineer, spending my time writing really great software, mostly back-end oriented. I have +{{years}} years of experience in the software industry. I've been writing software for quite a while now, both for work and pleasure. I enjoy continuing to learn and try out new technologies.
